title: What is the difference between the Middle Ages and Medieval Times? - Quora

response.answer_text: The passage of historical time….Medival Times occurred prior to the Middle Ages. Medieval Time reflects the chaos of tribulization as lack of cohesive, coherently structured, agreeable societal, definable culture. Middle Ages reflects the developmental societal cohesiveness that began to develop toward birth of sovereign, societal-definable alllegiance toward status of identifiable nationhood.
You don’t need quora to answer this.
